sentences.sContent: But presently we have no concrete prescript in the field. This thesis is trying to solve this problem.
sentences.sContent_eng: But presently we have no concrete prescript in the field. This thesis is trying to solve this problem.
sentences.sCn: 但目前国内尚无相关的具体规定，本文在这些方面做了初步的尝试。

sentences.sContent: The prescript of company dissolution system in our Company Law is shallow, so that had many problems in practice, the research of theoretics had not further development.
sentences.sContent_eng: The prescript of company dissolution system in our Company Law is shallow, so that had many problems in practice, the research of theoretics had not further development.
sentences.sCn: 我国《公司法》对公司解散制度的规定较为粗浅，以致在实践中出现了很多问题，理论界的研究也未进一步深入。

sentences.sContent: It completely shows the organic combinations of direction and independence, foundation and research, prescript and opening, division and synthesis, unification and variety, theory and practice.
sentences.sContent_eng: It completely shows the organic combinations of direction and independence, foundation and research, prescript and opening, division and synthesis, unification and variety, theory and practice.
sentences.sCn: 体现了指导与自主、基础与研究、规定与开放、分科与综合、统一与多样、理论与实践有机结合的教育指导思想。

remMethod.val: pre (预先) + script (手稿) → 预先写在纸上的 → 指定的

words.tran: 规范主义；规约论；指示论
